text:
I've had to resort to a third party handling an integration with an API and HubDB, because of the 20s limit.
I was never able to shave enough off and even if I were, it wouldn't be scalable at all.

Basically handling all the data processing (it was Teamtailors API, where you need to call multiple endpoints to grab "enough" data to populate a job listing), etc. elsewhere, then sending to HubDB.
Yeah did something similar, used HubDB to stores the results. Then just ping the table every 3 seconds to see when it's done
Are you still facing issue? We would have to look into your project code. Would it be possible to post it on <#C05R599UA12|ui-extensions> - to get better support from others in community?
